text: King Wadada, also known as Austin Peter, (born on 6 August 1975) Nigerian reggae musician, singer, and songwriter. In 2010, he won the Kora Awards as Africa's best reggae artist of the year. He is best known for his song "Holy Holy."http://www.punchng.com/feature/midweek-revue/kora-hasnt-paid-me-a-dime- king-wadada/ – The_Punch Nigerian newspaperhttp://allafrica.com/stories/201305220451.html – AllAfrica.comhttp://www.punchng.com/entertainment/arts-life/majek-wadada-on- mission-to-rebrand-reggae/ – The_Punch Nigerian newspaperhttp://www.modernghana.com/movie/2932/3/i-smoked-igbo-indian-hemp- heavilyreggae-act-king-w.html – Modernghana.comhttp://nationalmirroronline.net/new/people-are-jealous-that-im- taking-care-of-majek-fashek-king-wadada/ – National_Mirror Nigerian newspaperhttps://www.nollywoodgists.com/news/45519/singer-kinger-wada-signs- new-record-deal.html/ – Nollywoodgists ==Biography== King Wadada was born in Urhonigbe, in the Orhionmwon local government area of Edo State in Nigeria.http://www.nigerianobservernews.com/10082014/news/news18.html#.VWNgF1JmJT4 – Nigerian_Observer newspaper in 2016, he signed a management deal with Enorecords Snc, alongside with other Nigeria Dancehall artists, like Sidney Leo a.k.a. Supreme Leo,NaXis DG, Ebere Chi and many other top charts musicians from Italy , in 2017 he signed a distribution deal with VPAL music record label, a parent label to world known best reggae industry VP Records he is recently working with the Nigeria Reggae Superstar Kingsley Eno Osagie professionally known by stage name "Winning Jah" for various Africa Reggae projects. he has worked with the multiple Award Eu Pop Winner NaXis De GeneXis a.k.a. NaXis DG ==References== Category:Nigerian male musicians Category:Living people Category:English-language singers from Nigeria Category:1975 births Category:21st-century Nigerian singers Category:21st- century male singers
title: King Wadada
